# A Simple Markdown Parser in JavaScript ## Support for h1~h6 ###### Example: h6 ![img](/Users/elnifio/Downloads/Covid-19Vaccine.JPG) - - - ## Support for inline styles We can enter **BOLD texts, *BOLD AND ITALIC texts***, *Italic texts*, ~underlined **BOLD**, *Italic*, **BOLD AND ITALIC**~ texts. We can also write ~~Strikethrough~~, but it does not support combination with the above three formats. and this is another `Inline Code Snippets` are supported as well. Additional tutorials for Markdown could be found at their [wiki page](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown). If these styles do not fit your requirements, you could insert inline html, but you should be aware of this AUTOMATIC RETURN - - - ## Support for unordered & ordered lists 1. we can start an ordered list through numbers 1. this do not need to be kept sequential 1. and we could also insert some ~***italic bold underline***~ here. 13. `codes work fine here too`. 50. Nest a list within this list: - unordered list start - [link?](google.com) - ~~Strikethrough~~? 10.
